description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Fredriksdal Assault is a multiplayer game with two game modes, Assault and Deathmatch, where you can play with split screen, over a local network (System Link) or over the Internet (LIVE).
description.short: Fredriksdal Assault is a multiplayer game with two game modes, Assault and Deathmatch, where you can play with split screen, over a local network (System Link) or over the Internet (LIVE).
